net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor

Class BooleanLens

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor.Lens<java.lang.Boolean>
      • net.zerobandwidth.android.lib.database.sqlitehouse.refractor.BooleanLens
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Refractor<java.lang.Boolean>

    public class BooleanLens
extends Lens<java.lang.Boolean>
implements Refractor<java.lang.Boolean>
    Marshals Boolean values by converting them to/from integers.
    Since:
    zerobandwidth-net/android 0.1.4 (#26)
    See Also:
    SQLitePortal.boolToInt(boolean), SQLitePortal.intToBool(int)
